1a1('bum): (ca) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
1a2('bum): (黃) 大般若經第五部
1b1('bum): @##/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gcig pa/
1b2('bum): de nas byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
1b3('bum): 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
1b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsko ba mdzad pas/
1b5('bum): 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/
1b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gam/ gcig
1b7('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags
1b8('bum): grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa yang myed de/
2a1('bum): rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang
2a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
2a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa/ de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
2a4('bum): chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
2a5('bum): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa
2a6('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i
2a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
2a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong
2b1('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
2b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ting nge
2b3('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying
2b4('bum): rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / myi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/
2b5('bum): rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'du zhing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang
2b6('bum): chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
2b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs
2b8('bum): gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / myig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang /
3a1('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang
3a2('bum): yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang / sna'i
3a3('bum): rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes
3a4('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang
3a5('bum): yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin
3a6('bum): pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang / mye'i khams gang yin pa dang /
3a7('bum): rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin
3a8('bum): pa dang / mying dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa
3b1('bum): dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus
3b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi
3b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
3b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos
3b5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos
3b6('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang
3b7('bum): yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa
3b8('bum): dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug gang yin pa dang / zil kyis
4a1('bum): gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang yin pa dang / rgyas pa'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal
4a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang
4a3('bum): yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang /
4a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / myi
4a5('bum): dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus
4a6('bum): byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
4a7('bum): gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni bden
4a8('bum): pa yang ma yin/ myi bden pa yang ma yin ste/ gzugs myed pa bstan tu myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis na/ khyod
4b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun par theg pa chen po ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / shes
4b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
4b3('bum): tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang
4b4('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de/ gnyis
4b5('bum): su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar
4b6('bum): myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen
4b7('bum): po yang gzhan la/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang
4b8('bum): gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar
5a1('bum): na theg pa chen po dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /
5a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed
5a3('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg
5a4('bum): pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'dus
5a5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
5a6('bum): gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
5a7('bum): zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed
5a8('bum): de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /
5b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
5b2('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su
5b3('bum): byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen
5b4('bum): po yang gzhan la/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
5b5('bum): nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes
5b6('bum): bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan
5b7('bum): zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de
5b8('bum): ltar na theg pa chen po dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /
6a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dbang po rnams kyang gnyis
6a2('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / stobs rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang
6a3('bum): gzhan la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'phags pa'i
6a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'phags pa'i
6a5('bum): bden pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan
6a6('bum): zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / bsam gtan rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar
6a7('bum): na theg pa chen po dang / tshad myed pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzugs
6a8('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gnyis su
6b1('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
6b2('bum): yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
6b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mngon
6b4('bum): par shes pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis
6b5('bum): su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang
6b6('bum): gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang
6b7('bum): gzhan la/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ so so yang dag par rig
6b8('bum): pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ snying rje chen po yang
7a1('bum): gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
7a2('bum): kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas/
7a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan la 'di skad ces
7a4('bum): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su myi dmigs
7a5('bum): te gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /
7a6('bum): 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /
7a7('bum): rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs so/ /
7a8('bum): tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed byang chub sems
7b1('bum): dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de yang ma mchis myi dmyigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'
7b2('bum): thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ ma dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su
7b3('bum): bstan par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing bstan par bgyi/
7b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mying tsam du bas te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang / bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
7b5('bum): 'das de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba yang / byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la/ gang mngon
7b6('bum): par grub pa'i gzugs lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du shes lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du byed
7b7('bum): lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni/ gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub
7b8('bum): pa de ni tshor ba ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma lags te/
8a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags la mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang / gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmyigs su ma mchis na/ mngon par ma grub pa mngon par
8a2('bum): ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams su mchis sam/ gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'jum yongs su myi 'jum/ 'gyod par myi 'gyur
8a3('bum): zhing yid myi 'jigs myi dngang / skrag par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
8a4('bum): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmyigs su myed pa yin/ phyi ma'i mthar dmyigs su myed pa yin/
8a5('bum): dbus su dmyigs su myed pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshor ba kun tu mtha'
8a6('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du byed
8a7('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/
8a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/
8b1('bum): 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes
8b2('bum): bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag
8b3('bum): par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du byang
8b4('bum): chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par
8b5('bum): bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mying tsam du bas so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/
8b6('bum): de skad du ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi yang / bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par
8b7('bum): grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la/ gzugs mngon par grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ chor ba mngon par grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ 'du shes mngon par
8b8('bum): grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ 'du byed mngon par grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis te/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /gang
9a1('bum): mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnam par
9a2('bum): shes pa ma lags so/ /zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig /mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi 'am zhes smra/
9a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na 'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmyigs su ma mchis so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir
9a4('bum): na/ de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'jum yongs su myi 'jum 'gyod par myi 'gyur zhing / yid myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub
9a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
9a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
9a7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems cad dben pa dang / sems
9a8('bum): can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sems can stong pa
9b1('bum): dang / sems cad dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir na/ sems can myed pa dang / sems can stong pa
9b2('bum): dang sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so/ /dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sems can myed pa yang gzhan/ sems can stong pa yang
9b3('bum): gzhan/ sems can dben pa yang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin myed pa yang gzhan zhig la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan/ dbus kyang gzhan
9b4('bum): zhes bya ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sems can myed pa gang yin pa dang / sems can stong pa gang yin pa dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang
9b5('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
9b6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
9b7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs
9b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
10a1('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir
10a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs myed pa dang / gzugs stong
10a3('bum): pa nyid dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
10a4('bum): ma yin/ gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
10a5('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
10a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor
10a7('bum): ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong nyid pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
10a8('bum): dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
10b1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
10b2('bum): tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
10b3('bum): dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba dben pa dang tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la
10b4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo
10b5('bum): nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
10b6('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
10b7('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
10b8('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes
11a1('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
11a2('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
11a3('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
11a4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir na zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes myed pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes dben pa dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
11a5('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'du shes myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
11a6('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du shes myed pa gang yin
11a7('bum): pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du shes dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
11a8('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
11b1('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed myed pa'i
11b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
11b3('bum): so/ /'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
11b4('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
11b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'du
11b6('bum): byed myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
11b7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin
11b8('bum): pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
12a1('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
12a2('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid
12a3('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
12a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
12a5('bum): dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dben
12a6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par
12a7('bum): shes pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
12a8('bum): rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang
12b1('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa myed pa
12b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
12b3('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
12b4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig ngo bo
12b5('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
12b6('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /myig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig myed pa'i phyir byang chub
12b7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
12b8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig myed pa dang / myig stong pa nyid dang / myig dben pa dang / myig ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
13a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan
13a2('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na myig myed pa
13a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / myig stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig dben pa gang yin pa dang / myig ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
13a4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
13a5('bum): so/ /rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
13a6('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba dben
13a7('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
13a8('bum): dmyigs so/ /rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i byang chub
13b1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba myed pa dang / rna ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dben pa dang / rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi
13b2('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
13b3('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rna ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba stong
13b4('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
13b5('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
13b6('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna myed pa'i phyir byang
13b7('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna ngo bo nyid
13b8('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna dben
14a1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna myed pa dang sna stong pa
14a2('bum): nyid dang sna dben pa dang sna ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmigs te/ sna myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna dben pa yang gzhan
14a3('bum): ma yin/ sna ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa
14a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sna myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
14a5('bum): pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
14a6('bum): lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
14a7('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /lce myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
14a8('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
14b1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
14b2('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce myed pa dang / lce stong pa nyid dang / lce dben pa dang / lce ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce stong
14b3('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
14b4('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang
14b5('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus myed
14b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
14b7('bum): lus ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
14b8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus myed pa'i
15a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
15a2('bum): lus ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus myed pa dang / lus stong pa nyid dang / lus dben pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid myed
15a3('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus
15a4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang
15a5('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus myed pa gang yin pa dang / lus stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
15a6('bum): pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid myed pa'i phyir
15a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
15a8('bum): so/ /yid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
15b1('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid myed
15b2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
15b3('bum): yid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid myed pa dang / yid stong pa nyid dang / yid dben pa dang / yid ngo bo nyid myed pa la
15b4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid ngo bo nyid
15b5('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
15b6('bum): bu de ltar na yid myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang
15b7('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// //
15b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs
16a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
16a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
16a3('bum): dmyigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed
16a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
16a5('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid dang /
16a6('bum): gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang
16a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
16a8('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang /
16b1('bum): gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed
16b2('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
16b3('bum): sgra dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
16b4('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
16b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sgra
16b6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra myed pa
16b7('bum): dang sgra stong pa nyid dang / sgra dben pa dang / sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sgra myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sgra stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
16b8('bum): ma yin sgra dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
17a1('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sgra myed pa gang yin pa dang / sgra stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sgra dben pa gang yin pa dang / sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
17a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha
17a3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu dri myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
17a4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
17a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
17a6('bum): so/ /dri myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dri dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
17a7('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /dri ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dri myed pa dang / dri stong pa nyid dang / dri dben pa dang / dri ngo bo nyid myed
17a8('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dri myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dri stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dri dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dri ngo bo nyid myed pa
17b1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dri myed pa
17b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / dri stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dri dben pa gang yin pa dang / dri ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
17b3('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
17b4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ro dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ro ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
17b5('bum): ro myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ro dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
17b6('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ro ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ro myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ro stong pa nyid kyi
17b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ro ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
17b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro myed pa dang / ro stong pa nyid dang / ro dben pa dang / ro ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi
18a1('bum): dmyigs te/ ro myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ro stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ro dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ro ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
18a2('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ro myed pa gang yin pa dang / ro stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ro dben pa gang
18a3('bum): yin pa dang ro ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
18a4('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
18a5('bum): dmyigs so/ /reg dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub
18a6('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
18a7('bum): reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
18a8('bum): dmyigs so/ /reg dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
18b1('bum): dwa ti'i bu reg myed pa dang / reg stong pa nyid dang / reg dben pa dang / reg ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ reg myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg
18b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ reg dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
18b3('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na reg myed pa gang yin pa dang / reg stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / reg dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg ngo bo nyid myed pa gang
18b4('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan
18b5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub
18b6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
18b7('bum): chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
18b8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chos dben
19a1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos myed pa
19a2('bum): dang / chos stong pa nyid dang / chos dben pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chos myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
19a3('bum): ma yin/ chos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
19a4('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chos myed pa gang yin pa dang / chos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
19a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
19a6('bum): ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
19a7('bum): so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
19a8('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
19b1('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig
19b2('bum): gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa
19b3('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig gi
19b4('bum): rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi
19b5('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
19b6('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan
19b7('bum): ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa
19b8('bum): dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
20a1('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
20a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
20a3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
20a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
20a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
20a6('bum): su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
20a7('bum): so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
20a8('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i
20b1('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
20b2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
20b3('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
20b4('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
20b5('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
20b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
20b7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
20b8('bum): so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes
21a1('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
21a2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
21a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan
21a4('bum): ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
21a5('bum): gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /
21a6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
21a7('bum): kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa
21a8('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid
21b1('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
21b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
21b3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
21b4('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
21b5('bum): dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo
21b6('bum): nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
21b7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi
21b8('bum): ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin
22a1('bum): pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
22a2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
22a3('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
22a4('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
22a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
22a6('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/
22a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/
22a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
22b1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha'
22b2('bum): myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa
22b3('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
22b4('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par
22b5('bum): shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
22b6('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
22b7('bum): so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
22b8('bum): so yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
23a1('bum): so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
23a2('bum): dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
23a3('bum): dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
23a4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
23a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi rnam par
23a6('bum): shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma
23a7('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid kyi rnam par
23a8('bum): shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
23b1('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi
23b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus
23b3('bum): te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa
23b4('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/
23b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/
23b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
23b7('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa
23b8('bum): myed pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
24a1('bum): te myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed
24a2('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
