24a3('bum): na myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
24a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
24a5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus
24a6('bum): te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg
24a7('bum): pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben
24a8('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/
24b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
24b2('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang /
24b3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te
24b4('bum): reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
24b5('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang
24b6('bum): yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
24b7('bum): dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
24b8('bum): bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus
25a1('bum): te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed
25a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
25a3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus
25a4('bum): te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
25a5('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha'
25a6('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg
25a7('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa
25a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed
25b1('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
25b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus
25b3('bum): te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/
25b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
25b5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
25b6('bum): dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te
25b7('bum): reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te
25b8('bum): reg pa dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te
26a1('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
26a2('bum): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong
26a3('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
26a4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
26a5('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
26a6('bum): so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
26a7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi
26a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te
26b1('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang
26b2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lus kyi
26b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang
26b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
26b5('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid
26b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi
26b7('bum): ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
26b8('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
27a1('bum): dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
27a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg
27a3('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
27a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
27a5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
27a6('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
27a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
27a8('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi
27b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin
27b2('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi
27b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
27b4('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed
27b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg
27b6('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
27b7('bum): dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
27b8('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
28a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa
28a2('bum): nyid dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ /phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig
28a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
28a4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
28a5('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi
28a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
28a7('bum): dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
28a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
28b1('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i
28b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
28b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
28b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
28b5('bum): kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i
28b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang /
28b7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
28b8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
29a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
29a2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin
29a3('bum): pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa
29a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /
29a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
29a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
29a7('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
29a8('bum): so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
29b1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
29b2('bum): tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg
29b3('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
29b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben
29b5('bum): pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa yang
29b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
29b7('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /
29b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
30a1('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
30a2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/
30a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
30a4('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
30a5('bum): so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
30a6('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
30a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
30a8('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus
30b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang /
30b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
30b3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i
30b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
30b5('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang /
30b6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang
30b7('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed
30b8('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong
31a1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
31a2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
31a3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg
31a4('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
31a5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
31a6('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
31a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa
31a8('bum): dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi
31b1('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong
31b2('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
31b3('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
31b4('bum): kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi
31b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
31b6('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
31b7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
31b8('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
32a1('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
32a2('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang
32a3('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
32a4('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi
32a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
32a6('bum): ba myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la
32a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
32a8('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang
32b1('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na yid kyi 'dus
32b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi
32b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin
32b4('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa/ tshe dang ldan
32b5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
32b6('bum): sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams
32b7('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/
32b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
33a1('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
33a2('bum): dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams myed pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid
33a3('bum): dang / sa'i khams dben pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sa'i khams myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams
33a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
33a5('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sa'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams dben pa
33a6('bum): gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
33a7('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
33a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
33b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
33b2('bum): chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams myed
33b3('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
33b4('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams myed pa dang /
33b5('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang / chu'i khams dben pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chu'i khams
33b6('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
33b7('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chu'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang /
33b8('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang
34a1('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mye'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang
34a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
34a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
34a4('bum): myi dmyigs so / /mye'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
34a5('bum): mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams stong pa nyid kyi
34a6('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
34a7('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mye'i khams myed pa dang / mye'i khams stong pa nyid dang / mye'i khams dben pa dang / mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed
34a8('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mye'i khams myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mye'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mye'i khams
34b1('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
34b2('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mye'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / mye'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mye'i khams dben pa gang yin
34b3('bum): pa dang / mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
34b4('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams
34b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid
34b6('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
34b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
34b8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
35a1('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
35a2('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams myed pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid dang / rlung gi khams dben pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed
35a3('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rlung gi khams myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams
35a4('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
35a5('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rlung gi khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin
35a6('bum): pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
35a7('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams
35a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i
35b1('bum): khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam
35b2('bum): mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam
35b3('bum): mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
35b4('bum): nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i
35b5('bum): khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang /
35b6('bum): nam mkha'i khams dben pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ nam mkha'i khams myed pa yang
35b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
35b8('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na nam mkha'i
36a1('bum): khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang
36a2('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha
36a3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
36a4('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
36a5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
36a6('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
36a7('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong
36a8('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i
36b1('bum): khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams
36b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par
36b3('bum): shes pa'i khams myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo
36b4('bum): nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa
36b5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes
36b6('bum): pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
36b7('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
36b8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
37a1('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dben
37a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
37a3('bum): dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
37a4('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa myed pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang / ma rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid
37a5('bum): myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ ma rig pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa dben pa
37a6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
37a7('bum): gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ma rig pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed
37a8('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su
37b1('bum): byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
37b2('bum): so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed myed pa'i phyir/
37b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
37b4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed
37b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
37b6('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi
37b7('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'du byed myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo
37b8('bum): bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan
38a1('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
38a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par
38a3('bum): shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par
38a4('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
38a5('bum): rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
38a6('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
38a7('bum): so/ /rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
38a8('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
38b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
38b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
38b3('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
38b4('bum): gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam
38b5('bum): par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
38b6('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi
38b7('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
38b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
39a1('bum): dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
39a2('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
39a3('bum): dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
39a4('bum): so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs myed pa dang / mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / mying dang gzugs dben pa dang / mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon
39a5('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mying dang gzugs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang
39a6('bum): gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
39a7('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mying dang / gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa
39a8('bum): dang / mying dang gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
39b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched drug myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
39b2('bum): dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
39b3('bum): skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched
39b4('bum): drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug ngo bo
39b5('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi
39b6('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang
39b7('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched drug myed pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid dang / skye mched drug dben pa dang /
39b8('bum): skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ skye mched drug myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid
40a1('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
40a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ skye mched drug myed pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid
40a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
40a4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
40a5('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
40a6('bum): reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa stong pa
40a7('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
40a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
40b1('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
40b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg pa myed pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid dang / reg pa dben
40b3('bum): pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
40b4('bum): reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
40b5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid myed
40b6('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar
40b7('bum): myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
40b8('bum): so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/
41a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
41a2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
41a3('bum): su myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
41a4('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba myed pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor
41a5('bum): ba dben pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
41a6('bum): ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
41a7('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa
41a8('bum): gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin
41b1('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sred pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
41b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
41b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

41b5('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
41b6('bum): su myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sred pa myed pa dang / sred pa
41b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / sred pa dben pa dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sred pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/

42a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sred pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /

42a3('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
42a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /len pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /len pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
42a5('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /len pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

42a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /len pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
42a8('bum): dmyigs so/ /len pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa myed pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid dang /
42b1('bum): len pa dben pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ len pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ len pa stong pa nyid kyang

42b4('bum): pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
42b5('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ srid pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
42b6('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
42b7('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

43a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
43a2('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ srid pa myed pa dang / srid pa stong pa
43a3('bum): nyid dang / srid pa dben pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ srid pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa stong pa
43a4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
43a5('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na srid pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / srid pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /
43a6('bum): srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed
43a7('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
43a8('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba
43b1('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
43b2('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba stong pa nyid
43b3('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
43b4('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba myed pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang / skye ba dben pa dang / skye ba ngo bo myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
43b5('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ skye ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
43b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na skye
43b7('bum): ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
43b8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
44a1('bum): so/ /rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi
44a2('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
44a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
44a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi
44a5('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
44a6('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi myed pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid dang / rga shi dben pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rga shi
44a7('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
44a8('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rga shi myed pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi stong pa
44b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
44b2('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
44b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
44b4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
44b5('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
44b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
44b7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
44b8('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
45a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid
45a2('bum): dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sbyin pa'i
45a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
45a4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /
45a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben
45a6('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
45a7('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
45a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims
45b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
45b2('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa
45b3('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
45b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/
45b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims
45b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
45b7('bum): dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / tshul khrims
46a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul
46a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
46a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar
46a4('bum): na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshul
46a5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
46a6('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
46a7('bum): so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
46a8('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed
46b1('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha
46b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
46b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i
46b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
46b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
46b6('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
46b7('bum): yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
46b8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
47a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
47a2('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
47a3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
47a4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/
47a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
47a6('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus
47a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /brtson
47a8('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i
47b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
47b2('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid
47b3('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
47b4('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
47b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
47b6('bum): pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi
47b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
47b8('bum): so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
48a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
48a2('bum): phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan
