48a3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam
48a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam
48a5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / bsam
48a6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
48a7('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
48a8('bum): pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
48b1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
48b2('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi
48b3('bum): ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
48b4('bum): dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
48b5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
48b6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
48b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i
48b8('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
49a1('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
49a2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha
49a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa
49a4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang
49a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
49a6('bum): ti'i bu/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes
49a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
49a8('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/
49b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
49b2('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
49b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
49b4('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
49b5('bum): so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
49b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
49b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ nang stong pa nyid myed
49b8('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang
50a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nang stong pa
50a2('bum): nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
50a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
50a4('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa
50a5('bum): nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
50a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
50a7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong
50a8('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
50b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
50b2('bum): myi dmyigs te/ phyi stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
50b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na phyi
50b4('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
50b5('bum): pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang
50b6('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi
50b7('bum): nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
50b8('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
51a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
51a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
51a3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
51a4('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
51a5('bum): myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
51a6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
51a7('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
51a8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
51b1('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
51b2('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
51b3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
51b4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
51b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
51b6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
51b7('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid
51b8('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
52a1('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang
52a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
52a3('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid
52a4('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
52a5('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
52a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chen
52a7('bum): po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
52a8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chen po
52b1('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
52b2('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
52b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid myed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
52b4('bum): myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid
52b5('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
52b6('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /
52b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
52b8('bum): kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
53a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed
53a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
53a3('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed
53a4('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
53a5('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed
53a6('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
53a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang
53a8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
53b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na don
53b2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
53b3('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus
53b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus
53b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
53b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
53b7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
53b8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'dus
54a1('bum): byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
54a2('bum): so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
54a3('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
54a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
54a5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong
54a6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
54a7('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang / gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong
54a8('bum): pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus
54b1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
54b2('bum): dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
54b3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
54b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
54b5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
54b6('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang /
54b7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma
54b8('bum): byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
55a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'dus ma
55a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa
55a3('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang
55a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
55a5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
55a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
55a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha'
55a8('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
55b1('bum): so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
55b2('bum): dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa
55b3('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
55b4('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
55b5('bum): nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
55b6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin
55b7('bum): pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
55b8('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
56a1('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
56a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
56a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
56a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
56a5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
56a6('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa
56a7('bum): dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
56b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
56b2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang
56b3('bum): yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
56b4('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
56b5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa
56b6('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa
56b7('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa
56b8('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa
57a1('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa
57a2('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
57a3('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
57a4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa
57a5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar
57a6('bum): na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa
57a7('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang
57a8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
57b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
57b2('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
57b3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
57b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
57b5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
57b6('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa dang / rang bzhin
57b7('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
57b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
58a1('bum): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa
58a2('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
58a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
58a4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
58a5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
58a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
58a7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
58a8('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
58b1('bum): su myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa dang /
58b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
58b3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
58b4('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
58b5('bum): de ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed
58b6('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /
58b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
58b8('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
59a1('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
59a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
59a3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
59a4('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
59a5('bum): dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo
59a6('bum): nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
59a7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
59a8('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan
59b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
59b2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i
59b3('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/
59b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
59b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
59b6('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
59b7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
59b8('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
60a1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
60a2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang
60a3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
60a4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa
60a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin
60a6('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos
60a7('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
60a8('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
60b1('bum): dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
60b2('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
60b3('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
60b4('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed
60b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dngos
60b6('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
60b7('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa
60b8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong
61a1('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
61a2('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
61a3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
61a4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
61a5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
61a6('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo
61a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
61a8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
61b1('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo
61b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin
61b3('bum): no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
61b4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de
61b5('bum): gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
61b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed
61b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
61b8('bum): dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
62a1('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/
62a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/
62a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
62a4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la
62a5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
62a6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
62a7('bum): yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa
62a8('bum): gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa
62b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar
62b2('bum): myed do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
62b3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
62b4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
62b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
62b6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
62b7('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
62b8('bum): dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa dang /
63a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi
63a2('bum): dmyigs te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid
63a3('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
63a4('bum): bu/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang
63a5('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /
63a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
63a7('bum): dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
63a8('bum): dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
63b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag
63b2('bum): par spong ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba
63b3('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
63b4('bum): ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba myed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dben pa dang / yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi
63b5('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yang dag par spong ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par
63b6('bum): spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang
63b7('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yang dag par spong ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed
63b8('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /
64a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
64a2('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
64a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
64a4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
64a5('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu
64a6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
64a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
64a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa yang gzhan ma
64b1('bum): yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan
64b2('bum): ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
64b3('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub se mas dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su
64b4('bum): byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
64b5('bum): so/ /dbang po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po myed pa'i phyir/
64b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
64b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
64b8('bum): dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
65a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po myed pa dang / dbang po stong pa nyid dang / dbang po dben pa dang / dbang po ngo bo nyid
65a2('bum): myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dbang po myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po dben pa yang gzhan ma
65a3('bum): yin/ dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin
65a4('bum): no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dbang po myed pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dbang po dben pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
65a5('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
65a6('bum): stobs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs dben pa'i phyir/
65a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
65a8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
65b1('bum): so/ /stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
65b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /stobs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
65b3('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stobs myed pa dang / stobs stong pa nyid dang / stobs dben pa dang / stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
65b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stobs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stobs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa yang
65b5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
65b6('bum): de ltar na stobs myed pa gang yin pa dang / stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stobs dben pa gang yin pa dang / stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
65b7('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa'i
65b8('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i
66a1('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan
66a2('bum): lag myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan
66a3('bum): lag dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan
66a4('bum): lag myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag dben
66a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
66a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
66a7('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag
66a8('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /
66b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
66b2('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed
66b3('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi
66b4('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam
66b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
66b6('bum): dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
66b7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan
66b8('bum): lag brgyad pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
67a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
67a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
67a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
67a4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
67a5('bum): pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
67a6('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
67a7('bum): brgyad pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
67a8('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
67b1('bum): bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
67b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
67b3('bum): so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
67b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
67b5('bum): so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
67b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
67b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid
67b8('bum): myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
68a1('bum): ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
68a2('bum): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa gang yin pa dang /
68a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
68a4('bum): pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam
68a5('bum): gtan myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan dben
68a6('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan myed pa'i phyir/
68a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
68a8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
68b1('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
68b2('bum): dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan myed pa dang / bsam
68b3('bum): gtan stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan dben pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan myed
68b4('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
68b5('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam
68b6('bum): gtan myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
68b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
68b8('bum): ti'i bu/ tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
69a1('bum): tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
69a2('bum): tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa dben
69a3('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir/
69a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
69a5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshad myed pa myed pa dang /
69a6('bum): tshad myed pa stong pa nyid dang / tshad myed pa dben pa dang / tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshad myed pa myed pa
69a7('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
69a8('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na tshad myed pa myed pa gang
69b1('bum): yin pa dang / tshad myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang
69b2('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
69b3('bum): pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
69b4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
69b5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
69b6('bum): 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
69b7('bum): so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir/
69b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
70a1('bum): par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
70a2('bum): su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / gzugs
70a3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
70a4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
70a5('bum): pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
70a6('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs
70a7('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang
70a8('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar
70b1('bum): myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
70b2('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
70b3('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
70b4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
70b5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
70b6('bum): dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
70b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi
70b8('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par thar pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dben pa yang
71a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
71a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par thar pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa dben
71a3('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
71a4('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
71a5('bum): so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
71a6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas
