71a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
71a8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i
71b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
71b2('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben
71b3('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
71b4('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang / mthar
71b5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa yang
71b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i
71b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
71b8('bum): yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
72a1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
72a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
72a3('bum): ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa sgo stong pa
72a4('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
72a5('bum): smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
72a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
72a7('bum): dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i
72a8('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
72b1('bum): smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
72b2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par
72b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
72b4('bum): smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
72b5('bum): smon pa myed pa myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
72b6('bum): pa dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
72b7('bum): te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa
72b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
73a1('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
73a2('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
73a3('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
73a4('bum): myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
73a5('bum): kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa stong
73a6('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes
73a7('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
73a8('bum): mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/
73b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/
73b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
73b3('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par
73b4('bum): shes pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
73b5('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mngon par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes
73b6('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin
73b7('bum): no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mngon par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mngon
73b8('bum): par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
74a1('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin stong pa
74a2('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
74a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
74a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
74a5('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin
74a6('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
74a7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
74a8('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa yang
74b1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
74b2('bum): bu/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin myed pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
74b3('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan
74b4('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
74b5('bum): dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
74b6('bum): so/ /gzungs gyi sgo myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs
74b7('bum): kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo
74b8('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir/
75a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
75a2('bum): ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo myed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
75a3('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa
75a4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
75a5('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
75a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan
75a7('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
75a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
75b1('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin
75b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
75b3('bum): dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
75b4('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir/
75b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
75b6('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
75b7('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
75b8('bum): stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
76a1('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
76a2('bum): stobs myed pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa
76a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed
76a4('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myi 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
76a5('bum): so/ /myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub se mas dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs
76a6('bum): pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa dben
76a7('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa myed
76a8('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i
76b1('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myi
76b2('bum): 'jigs pa myed pa dang / myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid dang / myi 'jigs pa dben pa dang / myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
76b3('bum): te/ myi 'jigs pa myed yang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang
76b4('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na myi 'jigs pa myed pa
76b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
76b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
76b7('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
76b8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
77a1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir/
77a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i
77a3('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
77a4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par
77a5('bum): rig pa myed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
77a6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag
77a7('bum): par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang
77a8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag
77b1('bum): par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis
77b2('bum): su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
77b3('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying
77b4('bum): rje chen po myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po dben pa'i
77b5('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
77b6('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
77b7('bum): snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po myed pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid dang / snying
77b8('bum): rje chen po dben pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ snying rje chen po myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po
78a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
78a2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na snying rje chen po myed pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po
78a3('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
78a4('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
78a5('bum): ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs
78a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
78a7('bum): so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
78a8('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
78b1('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
78b2('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
78b3('bum): pa myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi
78b4('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
78b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang
78b6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sangs
78b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
78b8('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
79a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
79a2('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
79a3('bum): dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi
79a4('bum): dbyings myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
79a5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings myed pa
79a6('bum): dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chos kyi dbyings
79a7('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
79a8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na chos kyi dbyings myed pa gang yin pa dang /
79b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
79b2('bum): dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
79b3('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
79b4('bum): de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi
79b5('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
79b6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
79b7('bum): de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
79b8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin nyid myed pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
80a1('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang
80a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
80a3('bum): de ltar na de bzhin nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
80a4('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang yang
80a5('bum): dag pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i
80a6('bum): mtha' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag
80a7('bum): pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i
80a8('bum): mtha' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag
80b1('bum): pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' dben
80b2('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
80b3('bum): ti'i bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
80b4('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa yang gzhan ma
80b5('bum): yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
80b6('bum): yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i
80b7('bum): mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de
80b8('bum): gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i
81a1('bum): dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
81a2('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
81a3('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
81a4('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
81a5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
81a6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam
81a7('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi
81a8('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis
81b1('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi
81b2('bum): ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa
81b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
81b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang nyan thos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
81b5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
81b6('bum): dmyigs so/ /nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos
81b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
81b8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
82a1('bum): nyan thos dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
82a2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nyan thos myed pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / nyan thos dben pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi
82a3('bum): dmyigs te/ nyan thos myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
82a4('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nyan thos
82a5('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dben pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
82a6('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir/
82a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
82a8('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
82b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
82b2('bum): dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
82b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ngo bo
82b4('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang sangs rgyas myed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas
82b5('bum): dben pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang sangs rgyas myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid
82b6('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
82b7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang sangs rgyas myed pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs
82b8('bum): rgyas dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
83a1('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
83a2('bum): dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
83a3('bum): dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
83a4('bum): dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
83a5('bum): dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
83a6('bum): so/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub
83a7('bum): sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa
83a8('bum): nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' myed pa
83b1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
83b2('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
83b3('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
83b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang
83b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad
83b6('bum): mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen
83b7('bum): pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dben
83b8('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa'i
84a1('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir/
84a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thams cad
84a3('bum): mkhyen pa myed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
84a4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo
84a5('bum): nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /
84a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen
84a7('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis
84a8('bum): su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbus
84b1('bum): su myi dmyigs so/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/
84b2('bum): gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i
84b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas
84b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
84b5('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
84b6('bum): yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
84b7('bum): bu/ tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun
84b8('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
85a1('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
85a2('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang
85a3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
85a4('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'du shes kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
85a5('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
85a6('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan
85a7('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha'
85a8('bum): yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
85b1('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang
85b2('bum): chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
85b3('bum): bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
85b4('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam par
85b5('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' ma dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /
85b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang
85b7('bum): 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ myig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig ni nam
85b8('bum): mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying
86a1('bum): du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus myi dmyigs
86a2('bum): so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ myig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/
86a3('bum): rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
86a4('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying
86a5('bum): du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rna ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am
86a6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang
86a7('bum): 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa
86a8('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
86b1('bum): nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sna'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
86b2('bum): stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
86b3('bum): rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
86b4('bum): lce ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha'
86b5('bum): yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lce'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
86b6('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
86b7('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lus kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
86b8('bum): par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
87a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du lus stong pa
87a2('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
87a3('bum): des na/ lus kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ yid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
87a4('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
87a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
87a6('bum): yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des
87a7('bum): na/ yid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
87a8('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la
87b1('bum): ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
87b2('bum): de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
87b3('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sgra kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
87b4('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sgra ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
87b5('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sgra'i sngon
87b6('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sgra kun tu mtha'
87b7('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ dri kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
87b8('bum): yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dri ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
88a1('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dri'i sngon
88a2('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dri kun tu mtha'
88a3('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ ro kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
88a4('bum): par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ro ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
88a5('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ro'i sngon gyi mtha' myi
88a6('bum): phyi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ ro kun tu mtha'
88a7('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ reg kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
88a8('bum): mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi
88b1('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du
88b2('bum): reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ reg gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
88b3('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/ reg kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ chos kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
88b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha'
88b5('bum): la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
88b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus
88b7('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chos kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /
88b8('bum): gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
89a1('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
89a2('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa
89a3('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /
89a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang
89a5('bum): 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
89a6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi
89a7('bum): dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
89a8('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
89b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang
89b2('bum): 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
89b3('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi
89b4('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du
89b5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid
89b6('bum): la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
89b7('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
90a1('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
90a2('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas
90a3('bum): pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes
90a4('bum): pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
90a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /
90a6('bum): gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/
90a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
90a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
90b1('bum): de bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'
90b2('bum): 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
90b3('bum): par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/
90b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
90b5('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du yid kyi
90b6('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'
90b7('bum): 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
90b8('bum): mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
91a1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
91a2('bum): te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
91a3('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ myig gi 'dus
91a4('bum): te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
91a5('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la
91a6('bum): ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin
91a7('bum): du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /
91a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ sna'i
91b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/
91b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying
91b3('bum): du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong
91b4('bum): pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
91b5('bum): bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
91b6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas
91b7('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
91b8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
92a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
92a2('bum): par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
92a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
92a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
92a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ yid
92a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang
92a7('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam
92a8('bum): mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te stong pa nyid la mtha'
92b1('bum): 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang
92b2('bum): yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
92b3('bum): bu/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
92b4('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa
92b5('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang
92b6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di
92b7('bum): skad du ci'i phyir na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
92b8('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi
93a1('bum): dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
93a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
93a3('bum): bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sna'i
93a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
93a5('bum): tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas
93a6('bum): pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha'
93a7('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
93a8('bum): tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
93b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na
93b2('bum): nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
93b3('bum): de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la
93b4('bum): mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
93b5('bum): rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/
93b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
93b7('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
93b8('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /
94a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du
94a2('bum): ci'i phyir na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
94a3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha'
94a4('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha'
94a5('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
94a6('bum): tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sa'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
94a7('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi
94a8('bum): ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sa'i khams kyi sngon gyi
94b1('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sa'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
94b2('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ chu'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams ni nam
94b3('bum): mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /
94b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chu'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan
94b5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chu'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ mye'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
94b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mye'i khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
94b7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mye'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mye'i khams kyi sngon
94b8('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mye'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
94b9('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rlung gi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/
95a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
95a2('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rlung gi khams
95a3('bum): kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rlung gi
