95a4('bum): khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ nam mkha'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
95a5('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha'
95a6('bum): la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
95a7('bum): bu/ de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ nam mkha'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am
95a8('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ nam mkha'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /
95b1('bum): gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam
95b2('bum): par shes pa'i khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas
95b3('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi sngon gyi
95b4('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
95b5('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ ma rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
95b6('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi
95b7('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du ma
95b8('bum): rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ma rig pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
96a1('bum): bu/ rnam grangs des na/ ma rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas
96a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na
96a3('bum): nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
96a4('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe
96a5('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par shes pa
96a6('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
96a7('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du
96a8('bum): brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
96b1('bum): stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
96b2('bum): rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ mying dang gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
96b3('bum): bu/ mying dang gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas
96b4('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mying dang gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
96b5('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mying dang gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
96b6('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ skye mched drug kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan
96b7('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched drug ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha'
96b8('bum): yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ skye mched drug gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi
97a1('bum): ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ skye mched drug kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
97a2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
97a3('bum): bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
97a4('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha'
97a5('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ reg pa kun tu mtha' yas
97a6('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
97a7('bum): rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi
97a8('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshor ba'i sngon
97b1('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha'
97b2('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sred pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
97b3('bum): par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sred pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
97b4('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sred pa'i
97b5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sred pa kun tu mtha'
97b6('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ len pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
97b7('bum): rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ len pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
97b8('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ len pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
98a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na len pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
98a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ srid pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya
98a3('bum): zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ srid pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus
98a4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ srid pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi
98a5('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ srid pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
98a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
98a7('bum): bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
98a8('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu/ mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ skye ba'i sngon gyi mtha'
98b1('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ skye ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
98b2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rga shi kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
98b3('bum): bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
98b4('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rga shi'i sngon gyi mtha'
98b5('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rga shi kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
98b6('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
98b7('bum): yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha'
98b8('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sbyin pa'i
99a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /
99a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/
99a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
99a4('bum): ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
99a5('bum): nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
99a6('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
99a7('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya
99a8('bum): zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
99a9('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ bzod pa'i
99b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ bzod pa'i pha
99b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
99b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na
99b4('bum): nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
99b5('bum): bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am
99b6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang
99b7('bum): yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam
99b8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas
99b9('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
100a1('bum): de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
100a2('bum): te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
100a3('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
100a4('bum): par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi
100a5('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du
100a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am
100a7('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
100a8('bum): bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ nang stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
100b1('bum): mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi
100b2('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
100b3('bum): bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /
100b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ nang stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di
100b5('bum): skad du ci'i phyir na/ phyi stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong
100b6('bum): pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha'
100b7('bum): yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
100b8('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ phyi stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
101a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
101a2('bum): yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi
101a3('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du phyi nang stong
101a4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
101a5('bum): rnam grangs des na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kun tu
101a6('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
101a7('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /
101a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la
101b1('bum): mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
101b2('bum): par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ chen po stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
101b3('bum): bu/ chen po stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
101b4('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi
101b5('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chen po stong pa nyid kun tu mtha'
101b6('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
101b7('bum): mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi
101b8('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
102a1('bum): de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus
102a2('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang
102a3('bum): 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus byas
102a4('bum): stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas
102a5('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
102a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kun tu
102a7('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
102a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/
102b1('bum): nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
102b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'
102b3('bum): 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /
102b4('bum): gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
102b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
102b6('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
102b7('bum): nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mtha'
102b8('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
103a1('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam
103a2('bum): mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
103a3('bum): de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am
103a4('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya
103a5('bum): 'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
103a6('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
103a7('bum): te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dor ba myed
103a8('bum): pa/ stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
103b1('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
103b2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
103b3('bum): dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan
103b4('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'
103b5('bum): 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
103b6('bum): par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
103b7('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
103b8('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i
103b9('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la
104a1('bum): mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
104a2('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer
104a3('bum): ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
104a4('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
104a5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
104a6('bum): nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun
104a7('bum): tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la
104a8('bum): ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
104b1('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa
104b2('bum): nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
104b3('bum): rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan
104b4('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
104b5('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dngos po
104b6('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
104b7('bum): des na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas
104b8('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
105a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas
105a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
105a3('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
105a4('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig
105a5('bum): par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi
105a6('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dngos po
105a7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi
105a8('bum): dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
105b1('bum): par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
105b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ namakha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
105b3('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
105b4('bum): kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
105b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ yang dag par spong ba kun du mtha' yas pa'i
105b6('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
105b7('bum): ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /
105b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/
106a1('bum): stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yang dag par spong ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun
106a2('bum): tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba
106a3('bum): ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
106a4('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa
106a5('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang
106a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du
106a7('bum): ci'i phyir na/ dbang po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/
106a8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam
106b1('bum): mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dbang po rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong
106b2('bum): nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dbang po kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang
106b3('bum): yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stobs rnams ni nam mkha' dang
106b4('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
106b5('bum): phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ stobs rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
106b6('bum): myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ stobs rnams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
106b7('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ byang chub kyi yan lag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya
106b8('bum): zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni namakha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
107a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du
107a2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus
107a3('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub kyi yan lag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang
107a4('bum): yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan
107a5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
107a6('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
107a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs
107a8('bum): so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /
107b1('bum): gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags
107b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
107b3('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
107b4('bum): kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'phags
107b5('bum): pa'i bden pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ bsam gtan kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
107b6('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam
107b7('bum): mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
107b8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ bsam gtan rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te stong pa nyid la
108a1('bum): mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
108a2('bum): par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ tshad myed pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa
108a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshad myed pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
108a4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
108a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshad myed pa kun tu mtha'
108a6('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang
108a7('bum): chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
108a8('bum): na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /
108b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
108b2('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang
108b3('bum): chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
108b4('bum): par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
108b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa
108b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang
108b7('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/
108b8('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
109a1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
109a2('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
109a3('bum): 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi
109a4('bum): dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
109a5('bum): bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
109a6('bum): par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/
109a7('bum): nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
109a8('bum): bu/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i sngon gyi
109b1('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
109b2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di
109b3('bum): skad du ci'i phyir na/ mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par shes pa rnams
109b4('bum): ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha'
109b5('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
109b6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha'
109b7('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ ting nge 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
109b8('bum): mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha'
110a1('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
110a2('bum): bu/ de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus
110a3('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na ting nge 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di
110a4('bum): skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo
110a5('bum): rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas
110a6('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
110a7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzungs
110a8('bum): kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
110b1('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i
110b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'
110b3('bum): zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
110b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
110b5('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ myi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
110b6('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na
110b7('bum): nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /
110b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid
111a1('bum): la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na myi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
111a2('bum): yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer
111a3('bum): ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi
111a4('bum): ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du so so yang dag
111a5('bum): par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am
111a6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
111a7('bum): rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na snying rje chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang
111a8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
111b1('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ snying rje
111b2('bum): chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam
111b3('bum): grangs des na/ snying rje chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
111b4('bum): ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
111b5('bum): 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
111b6('bum): te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
111b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang
111b8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang
112a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes
112a2('bum): bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed
112a3('bum): cing myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs shes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong
112a4('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
112a5('bum): lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshor ba myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
112a6('bum): tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du shes myed byang chub sems dpa' myed
112a7('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
112a8('bum): stong pa nyid la 'du byed myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
112b1('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par shes pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes
112b2('bum): pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
112b3('bum): stong pa nyid la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
112b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bzod pa'i pha rol
112b5('bum): tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed
112b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/
112b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ byang chub
112b8('bum): sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid myed byang chub
113a1('bum): sems dpa' myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
113a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed/
113a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /don dam pa stong
113a4('bum): pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/
113a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
113a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mtha'
113a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la thog ma
113a8('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed byang chub
113b1('bum): sems dpa' myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /chos thams cad
113b2('bum): stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rang gi
113b3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa
113b4('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
113b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid
113b6('bum): stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po
113b7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
113b8('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
114a1('bum): ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par spong ba rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu
114a2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
114a3('bum): zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dbang po rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stobs rnams myed byang chub
114a4('bum): sems dpa' myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed/ byang chub
114a5('bum): sems dpa' myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
114a6('bum): brgyad pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa
114a7('bum): rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gtan rnams myed/ byang chub
114a8('bum): sems dpa' myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni/ tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshad myed pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /
114b1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
114b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa brgyad myed/
114b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
114b4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni rnam par thar pa'i
114b5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed/ byang chub
114b6('bum): sems dpa' myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ mngon par shes rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mngon par shes pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /
114b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ting nge 'dzin rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ gzungs kyi
114b8('bum): sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
115a1('bum): stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams ni/ myi
115a2('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la myi 'jigs pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig
115a3('bum): pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /snying rje chen po ni/ snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong
115a4('bum): pa nyid la snying rje chen po myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
115a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings myed/ byang chub sems
115a6('bum): dpa' myed do/ /de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/
115a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yang dag pa'i mtha' myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
115a8('bum): stong pa nyid la bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la thams cad
115b1('bum): shes pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed/ byang chub
115b2('bum): sems dpa' myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed
115b3('bum): do/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas
115b4('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
115b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rang
115b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa
115b7('bum): nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs
115b8('bum): so/ /tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed byang chub sems dpa'
116a1('bum): zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du
116a2('bum): bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmyigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing
116a3('bum): rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad smras shes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ni tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshor
116a4('bum): ba ni tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes ni 'du shes la myed cing myi
116a5('bum): dmyigs so/ /'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams
116a6('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa
116a7('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed la myed cing myi dmyigs
116a8('bum): so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ni myig la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig ni rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba ni rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba ni myig la myed cing myi dmyigs
116b1('bum): so/ /myig dang rna ba ni sna la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna ni sna la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ sna ni myig dang rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig dang rna ba dang sna ni lce la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce
116b2('bum): ni lce la myed cing myi dmigs so/ /lce ni myig dang rna ba dang sna la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce ni lus la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus ni lus la myed cing myi
116b3('bum): dmyigs so/ /lus ni myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus ni yid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid ni yid la myed cing myed myi dmyigs so/ /yid
116b4('bum): ni myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ni sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sgra ni sgra la myed cing myi
116b5('bum): dmyigs so/ /sgra ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra ni dri la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dri ni dri la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dri ni gzugs dang sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
116b6('bum): gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ro ni ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro ni reg la myed cing myi
116b7('bum): dmyigs so/ /reg ni reg la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos
116b8('bum): ni chos la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la myed cing myi dmigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
117a1('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa la myed
117a2('bum): cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par
117a3('bum): shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing
117a4('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing
117a5('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa
117a6('bum): ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing
117a7('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa
117a8('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /
117b1('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
117b2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus
117b3('bum): te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la
117b4('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
117b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus
117b6('bum): te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus
117b7('bum): te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg
117b8('bum): pa dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
118a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
118a2('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te
118a3('bum): reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
118a4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
118a5('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te

123b5('bum): pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
