128b6('bum): chags dang bral ba'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni/ rang
128b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i
128b8('bum): sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang srabs pa'i sa dang /
129a1('bum): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la
129a2('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i
129a3('bum): sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs
129a4('bum): pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
129a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang
129a6('bum): bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
129a7('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni thams cad
129a8('bum): shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams
129b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa la
129b2('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa la
129b3('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni phyir myi 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyir 'ong ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang
129b4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dgra bcom pa ni dgra bcom pa la myed cing myi
129b5('bum): dmyigs so/ /dgra bcom pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa ni rang
129b6('bum): sangs rgyas la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa la myed
129b7('bum): cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ni byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'
129b8('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas la myed cing
130a1('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin
130a2('bum): gshegs pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba
130a3('bum): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shes
130a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems
130a5('bum): dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gdams shing rjes su bstan pa
130a6('bum): ni/ gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
130a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar chos thams cad myed cing myi dmyigs su myed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' myed cing dmyigs su myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad
130a8('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni
130b1('bum): glo bur du mying du brtags pa ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba
130b2('bum): zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /
130b3('bum): mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ de ni tshor ba ma yin/ de ni 'du shes ma yin/ de ni 'du byed ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni
130b4('bum): mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste
130b5('bum): myig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / sna zhes bya ba dang / lce zhes bya ba dang / lus shes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong
130b6('bum): gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ mig ma yin/ de ni rna ba ma yin/ de ni sna ma yin/ de ni lce ma yin/ de ni lus ma yin/ de ni yid ma yin no/ /de
130b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang
130b8('bum): ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / sgra zhes bya ba dang / dri zhes bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang / reg ces bya ba dang / chos shes bya ba'i ni glo bur du ming du brtags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni
131a1('bum): gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ de ni sgra ma yin/ de ni dri ma yin/ de ni ro ma yin/ de ni reg
131a2('bum): ma yin/ de ni chos ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di
131a3('bum): ni mying tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /
131a4('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong
131a5('bum): gang du yang mi 'gro gang na yang mi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/
131a6('bum): de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong
131a7('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes
131a8('bum): bya ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
131b1('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa
131b2('bum): ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin
131b3('bum): no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes
131b4('bum): bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
131b5('bum): kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya
131b6('bum): ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
131b7('bum): kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni lus
131b8('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni
132a1('bum): mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams shes bya ba dang / chu'i khams
132a2('bum): shes bya ba dang / mye'i khams shes bya ba dang / rlung gi khams shes bya ba dang / nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar
132a3('bum): mying ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ba gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin/ de ni chu'i khams ma yin/ de ni mye'i khams ma yin/ de ni rlung
132a4('bum): gi khams ma yin/ de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/
132a5('bum): de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni/ mying tsam mo zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /
132a6('bum): mying dang gzugs shes bya ba dang / skye mched drug ces bya ba dang / reg pa zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sred pa zhes bya ba dang / len pa zhes bya ba dang / srid pa zhes bya ba dang / skye ba zhes bya ba dang / rga
132a7('bum): shi zhes bya ba 'di ni/ glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin/ de ni 'du
132a8('bum): byed ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin/ de ni skye mched drug ma yin/ de ni reg pa ma yin/ de ni tshor ba ma yin/ de ni sred pa ma yin/ de ni len pa ma yin/ de ni
132b1('bum): srid pa ma yin/ de ni skye ba ma yin/ de ni rga shi ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
132b2('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ sbyin
132b3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste mying gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
132b4('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed
132b5('bum): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di
132b6('bum): ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
132b7('bum): mying gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ brtson
132b8('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin
133a1('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ bsam
133a2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / bsam
133a3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying
133a4('bum): tsam ste/ mying la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de
133a5('bum): gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang nang stong pa nyid myed/ nang
133a6('bum): stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di
133a7('bum): ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang phyi stong pa nyid myed/ phyi stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid
133a8('bum): gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang phyi nang
133b1('bum): stong pa nyid myed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/
133b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i
133b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /
133b4('bum): 'di lta ste/ chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang chen po stong pa nyid myed/ chen po stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa
133b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/
133b6('bum): mying la yang don dam pa stong pa nyid myed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi
133b7('bum): dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed/ 'dus byas stong
133b8('bum): pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
134a1('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir
134a2('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta
134a3('bum): ste/ mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang
134a4('bum): yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ thog ma dang tha
134a5('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang /
134a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa
134a7('bum): nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid myed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang
134a8('bum): yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang
134b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/
134b2('bum): de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed/ chos thams
134b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang
134b4('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang
134b5('bum): mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
134b6('bum): 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
134b7('bum): ltar mying gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/
134b8('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang /
135a1('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
135a2('bum): nyid 'di ni/ mying tsam ste/ mying la yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin
135a3('bum): pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang dngos po
135a4('bum): myed ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ dngos po myed ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
135a5('bum): gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
135a6('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
135a7('bum): rnams myed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi
135a8('bum): dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du
135b1('bum): btags pa ste/ mying la yang yang dag par spong ba rnams myed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
135b2('bum): gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
135b3('bum): rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang /
135b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/
135b5('bum): dbang po rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang dbang po rnams myed/ dbang po rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dbang po
135b6('bum): rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ stobs rnams shes bya ba
135b7('bum): 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang stobs rnams myed/ stobs rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka
135b8('bum): yang myed cing / myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo
136a1('bum): bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang /
136a2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/
136a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang mying myed
136a4('bum): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni
136a5('bum): mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed/ 'phags
136a6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang
136a7('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang bsam gtan rnams myed/
136a8('bum): bsam gtan rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub
136b1('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ tshad myed pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang tshad myed pa rnams myed/ tshad myed
136b2('bum): pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
136b3('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang gzugs
136b4('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
136b5('bum): 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par
136b6('bum): thard pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang rnam par thard pa rnams myed/ rnam par thard pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin
136b7('bum): pa dang / rnam par thard pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta
136b8('bum): ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i
137a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing
137a2('bum): myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
137a3('bum): dang / smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams myed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying
137a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
137a5('bum): 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang mngon par shes pa rnams myed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
137a6('bum): na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa
137a7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang ting nge 'dzin rnams myed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
137a8('bum): 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan
137b1('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i
137b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang
137b3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed/ de bzhin gshegs
137b4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir
137b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang myi 'jigs
137b6('bum): pa rnams myed/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/
137b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang so so yang
137b8('bum): dag par rig pa rnams myed/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing
138a1('bum): myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying
138a2('bum): du btags pa ste/ mying la yang byams pa chen po myed/ byams pa chen po la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang
138a3('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying
138a4('bum): du btags pa ste/ mying la yang snying rje chen po myed/ snying rje chen po la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi
138a5('bum): dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du
138a6('bum): mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / sangs
138a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/
138a8('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang thams cad shes pa nyid myed/ thams cad shes pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa
138b1('bum): dang / thams cad shes pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/
138b2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying
138b3('bum): gang yin pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
138b4('bum): bu/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /
138b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni
138b6('bum): mying tsam mo/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dgu pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di
138b7('bum): skad du dper na/ bdag bdag ces bya ste/ bdag shin du mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper na sems can sems can zhes ste/ sems can shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper na srog srog ces bya ste/
138b8('bum): srog shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper na 'gro ba 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ 'gro ba shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper na gso' ba gso' ba zhes bya ste/ gso' ba shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper
139a1('bum): na skyes bu skyes bu zhes bya ste/ skyes bu shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper na gang zag gang zag ces bya ste/ gang zag shin tu mngon par 'grub bo/ /dper na shed can shed can zhes bya ste/ shed
139a2('bum): can shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper na shed bdag shed bdag ces bya ste/ shed bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper na byed pa po byed pa po zhes bya ste/ byed pa po shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper na
139a3('bum): tshor ba po tshor ba po zhes bya ste/ tshor ba po shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper na shes pa po shes pa po zhes bya ste/ shes pa po shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /dper na mthong ba po mthong ba po zhes bya ste/ mthong
139a4('bum): ba po shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /zhes ci'i phyir de skad du zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sems
139a5('bum): can shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ srog shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'gro ba shin tu myed cing myi
139a6('bum): dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gso' ba shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ skyes bu shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub
139a7('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gang zag shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ shed can shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta
139a8('bum): ga la yod/ shed bdag shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byed pa po shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor
139b1('bum): ba po shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ shes pa po shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mthong ba po shin tu myed

139b3('bum): na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'du shes shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'du byed shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub

139b5('bum): ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sna shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lce shin tu

143a1('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ bdag bdag ces kyang bya ste/ bdag shin tu mngon par 'grub pa myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

143a3('bum): bu/ 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed pa yin/ smras pa gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /

179b7('bum): gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams

180a3('bum): myed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams

185a6('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /bsam gtan
185a7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i
185a8('bum): rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
185b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin
185b2('bum): ni de yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /'dus
185b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /mtha' las
185b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /
185b5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /chos thams cad
185b6('bum): stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /myi dmyigs pa
185b7('bum): stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa
185b8('bum): nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /tshe dang
186a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
186a2('bum): zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /dbang po rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

186a4('bum): rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag pa ma
186a5('bum): yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /tshad myed pa rnams rtag pa
186a6('bum): ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin
186a7('bum): no/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/
186a8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /

186b8('bum): yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

199a8('bum): tu phyin pa la ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems
199b1('bum): dpa' de lta bu myi dmyigs so/ /zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par ma grub pa yang gzhan la byang

200b1('bum): ma grub pa ma gtogs par chos yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos shes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /

200b4('bum): par ma grub pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par sna'i rnam par shes
200b5('bum): pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon
200b6('bum): par ma grub pa ma gtogs par lce'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni
200b7('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang /
200b8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su myi
201a1('bum): mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par
201a2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par ma grub pa

206a6('bum): par ma grub pa dang / byams pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par snying rje chen po yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de
206a7('bum): ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
206a8('bum): brgyad yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon
206b1('bum): par ma grub pa ma gtogs par thams cad shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de
206b2('bum): gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par ma grub par ma gtogs par lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya
206b3('bum): ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa
206b4('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos de gnyis ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mngon par ma grub pa ma gtogs par gang
206b5('bum): byang chub tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
206b6('bum): gal te myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smras shes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
206b7('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad byed pa myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong la/ chos thams cad rmi lam dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / chos thams
206b8('bum): cad sgyu ma dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / chos thams cad smyig sgyu dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / chos
207a1('bum): thams cad mig yor dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong / chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
207a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bstan pa 'di thos na myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan
207a3('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i
207a4('bum): tshe/ 'di ni gzugs shes bgyi bar gzugs la myi dmyigs shing mi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni tshor ba zhes bgyi bar tshor ba la
207a5('bum): myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni 'du shes shes bgyi bar 'du shes la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par
207a6('bum): zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni 'du byed ces bgyi bar 'du byed la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la/ 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /
207a7('bum): de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar rnam par shes pa la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni myig ces bgyi
207a8('bum): bar myig la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni rna ba zhes bgyi bar rna ba la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas
207b1('bum): te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni sna zhes bgyi bar sna la myi dmyigs shing mi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i
207b2('bum): tshe 'di ni lce zhes bgyi bar lce la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni lus shes bgyi bar lus la
207b3('bum): myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni yid ces bgyi bar yid la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/
207b4('bum): mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni gzugs shes bgyi bar gzugs la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la
207b5('bum): 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni sgra zhes bgyi bar sgra la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni
207b6('bum): dri zhes bgyi bar dri la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni ro zhes bgyi bar ro la myi dmyigs shing
207b7('bum): myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni reg ces bgyi bar reg la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen
207b8('bum): par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni chos shes bgyi bar chos la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par mi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa

208a6('bum): par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la

208a8('bum): par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi bar sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par

209a1('bum): myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi bar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

209a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi dmyigs
209a4('bum): shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi dmyigs

209a7('bum): myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
209a8('bum): myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

211a7('bum): de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhes bgyi bar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon
211a8('bum): par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams shes bgyi bar mngon par shes pa rnams la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la

211b4('bum): myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bgyi bar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon
211b5('bum): par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /de'i tshe 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes bgyi bar byams pa chen po la myi dmyigs shing myi len myi gnas te/ mngon par zhen par myi bgyid la 'dogs par myi bgyid do/ /
