259b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te
259b8('bum): reg pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
260a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi
260a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi
260a3('bum): rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
260a4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
260a5('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug ces
260a6('bum): bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
260a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su
260a8('bum): myi rtog go/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar
260b1('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba
260b2('bum): dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rna ba'i
260b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi
260b4('bum): rtog go/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /
260b5('bum): smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes
260b6('bum): bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
260b7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sna'i 'dus
260b8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sna'i
261a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /
261a2('bum): smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes
261a3('bum): bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
261a4('bum): tshor ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lce'i 'dus
261a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
261a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon
261a7('bum): pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes
261a8('bum): bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lus kyi 'dus te
261b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar
261b2('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba dang /
261b3('bum): mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
261b4('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /

261b6('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang /
261b7('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong
261b8('bum): zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
262a1('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
262a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sa'i khams
262a3('bum): bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sa'i khams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sa'i khams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces
262a4('bum): bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sa'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
262a5('bum): sa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sa'i khams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sa'i khams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben
262a6('bum): zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chu'i khams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chu'i khams
262a7('bum): bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chu'i khams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chu'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar
262a8('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ /chu'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chu'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
262b1('bum): chu'i khams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chu'i khams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mye'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar
262b2('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ /mye'i khams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mye'i khams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mye'i khams
262b3('bum): sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mye'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mye'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma
262b4('bum): myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mye'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mye'i khams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
262b5('bum): mye'i khams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rlung gi khams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rlung gi khams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug
262b6('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rlung gi khams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rlung gi khams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog
262b7('bum): go/ /rlung gi khams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rlung gi khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rlung gi khams smon pa yod
262b8('bum): ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rlung gi khams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rlung gi khams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes

268a6('bum): ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan
268a7('bum): ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su
268a8('bum): myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong
268b1('bum): pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya
268b2('bum): ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan
268b3('bum): ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar

273b7('bum): bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba dang /

274a1('bum): yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su

274a3('bum): su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /

286a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha

291a8('bum): rnam grangs des na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed
291b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang
291b2('bum): yin pa de/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/
291b3('bum): skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
291b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan
291b5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
291b6('bum): bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
291b7('bum): ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba
291b8('bum): rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ yang dag par spong
292a1('bum): ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang
292a2('bum): stong pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
292a3('bum): pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
292a4('bum): rnam grangs des na/ dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de
292a5('bum): ni stobs rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
292a6('bum): bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
292a7('bum): rnam grangs des na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
292a8('bum): brgyad pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam
292b1('bum): grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags
292b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des
292b3('bum): na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams
292b4('bum): kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
292b5('bum): bsam gtan rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshad myed pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang
292b6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ tshad myed pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
292b7('bum): 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
292b8('bum): ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
293a1('bum): ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
293a2('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i
293a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/

293a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
293a6('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa
293a7('bum): myed pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par
293a8('bum): shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang
293b1('bum): yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /
293b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs
293b3('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa
293b4('bum): de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
293b5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
293b6('bum): stobs rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /
293b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par

294a1('bum): des na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen
294a2('bum): pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni byams pa chen po ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma
294a3('bum): yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
294a4('bum): snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/

294a6('bum): pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin
294a7('bum): te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lam gyi
294a8('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lam
294b1('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong

294b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/
294b4('bum): tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma

294b8('bum): pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang
295a1('bum): yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de
295a2('bum): ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus
295a3('bum): te reg pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/

295a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi
295b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin/ mye'i khams
295b2('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mye'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha'i khams

295b4('bum): yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ mying dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mying dang gzugs ma yin/

295b8('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
296a1('bum): pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

296a3('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa
296a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/
296a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ mtha'
296a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma stong pa nyid
296a7('bum): ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/ chos
296a8('bum): thams stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/
296b1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong

296b5('bum): rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags
296b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/

296b8('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

307b5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di myig ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rna ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rna ba/ rna ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

307b7('bum): grangs des na/ gang 'di sna zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar lce yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lce/ lce nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
307b8('bum): gang 'di lce zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar lus kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lus/ lus nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lus
307b9('bum): shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar yid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yid/ yid nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di yid ces bya
308a1('bum): ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang
308a2('bum): ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar sgra yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang
308a3('bum): gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sgra/ sgra nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sgra zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar
308a4('bum): dri yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dri/ dri nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dri zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i
308a5('bum): grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar ro yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ro/ ro nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ro zhes bya
308a6('bum): ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar reg kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang reg /reg nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
308a7('bum): des na/ gang 'di reg ces bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar chos kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chos/ chos nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
308a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di chos shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang
308b1('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas
308b2('bum): pa'o/ /'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
308b3('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam

308b5('bum): shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lce'i
308b6('bum): rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid
308b7('bum): kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa

309a1('bum): myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

309b7('bum): su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i

310a8('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mye'i khams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams

310b3('bum): byas pa'o/ /'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
310b4('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar ma rig pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa

310b7('bum): rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam
310b8('bum): par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar mying dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs/ mying dang gzugs nyid kyang

311a3('bum): reg pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang reg pa reg pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di reg pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs

311a5('bum): zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar sred pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sred pa/ sred pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
311a6('bum): dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sred pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar len pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang len pa/ len pa nyid
311a7('bum): kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di len pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar srid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
311a8('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang srid pa/ srid pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di srid pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar skye ba yang gzhan ma yin/
311b1('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang skye ba/ skye ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di skye ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar
311b2('bum): rga shi yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rga shi/ rga shi nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rga shi zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i
311b3('bum): grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa
311b4('bum): ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin
311b5('bum): te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni
311b6('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes
311b7('bum): pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes
311b8('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di brtson 'grus kyi
312a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes
312a2('bum): pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis
312a3('bum): su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
312a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su myed pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// //
